rules_text:
Reach
[i]Accost[/i] – Whenever Midir, Yngvi Bow Knight deals damage to a creature, you may untap him. If you do, him and that creature fight. [i](Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)[/i]
[i]Follow-Up[/i] – Whenever Midir, becomes blocked by a creature with lesser toughness, he gains double strike until end of turn.
